sentences.sentence: Does Hobbes' emphasis on the preservation of life as the supreme moral value? Does this turn his mighty Leviathan into a kind of commonwealth of cowards?
sentences.translation: 霍布斯强调把保护生命作为最高的道德价值吗？难道这就把他强大的利维坦变成了一个懦夫的联邦吗？

sentences.sentence: Ye paltry cowards, and arm yourselves and guard the doors, whilst I send one to fetch the watch!
sentences.translation: 你们这些没用的懦夫，武装起来，守住那些门，我派一个人去叫卫兵！

sentences.sentence: You cowards, what you know how it feels to say no to your dreams.
sentences.translation: 你这个胆小鬼，你知道对梦想说不是什么感觉吗？
